cookie.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
cookie.description: Semi-sweet chocolate chips and puddles of dark chocolate, finished with sea salt. Inspired by Kobe's paws.

keyLimeBar.name: Carrot Cupcake
keyLimeBar.description: Ginger, nutmeg, and cinnamon-spiced carrot cake with cream cheese frosting and a fondant carrot topper. Inspired by Kobe's staple breakfast.
